snippet: Montreal’s Olympic Stadium will be ready to host a large soccer crowd in less than two weeks, despite the collapse of a concrete slab inside a stadium parking lot.
abstract: Montreal’s Olympic Stadium will be ready to host a large soccer crowd, despite the collapse of a concrete slab inside a stadium parking lot; MLS expansion team Montreal Impact will play its first games at the stadium until nearby Saputo Stadium is renovated.
lead_paragraph: Montreal’s Olympic Stadium will be ready to host a large soccer crowd in less than two weeks, despite the collapse of a concrete slab inside a stadium parking lot.
